items.title: Xero Online Bookkeeping
items.headline: Learn how to use  Xero, the leading online accounting software to perform several essential bookkeeping tasks.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to complete various common functions using Xero
Enter the opening balances
Amend the nominal ledger

items.title: Apple macOS and iOS System Administration

visible_instructors.title: Automata Technology
visible_instructors.name: Automata
visible_instructors.job_title: Consulting and IT Services focused on Creative Industries

items.headline: Manage different.  Learn to install, configure, and automate the maintenance of hundreds of macOS and iOS devices.
objectives_summary: You will learn strategies for managing thousands of iOS and macOS endpoints.
You will use free open source tools like Munki that rival expensive management software to upgrade applications and manage the user experience on macOS clients.
You will learn to use Profile Manager, Apple Configurator, Apple’s Volume Purchase Program and Apple’s Device Enrollment Programs to configure and mass deploy iOS devices across the enterprise.

items.title: Help Desk Professional: A guide to your IT career
items.headline: Master the Help desk position by working smarter and boost your career opportunities
objectives_summary: Computer skills to help you break into the IT world
How to quickly diagnose computer related issue and the steps to take to resolve problems
How to communicate with users and provide the best IT experience

items.title: The Complete VMware vSphere 7 : Beginner to Advanced-pt 2/2
items.headline: Delve into advanced features, learn to use Vmware vSphere 7 as it was meant to be used, Full Practical Training Course
objectives_summary: Configure and Manage Distributed Resource Scheduler™ DRS & Storage DRS to improve host scalability
Plan and Implement VMware High availability (HA) and Fault Tolerance (FT)
Create and Administer Resource Pools, vAPP, Clone, Template and Snapshot

items.title: Linux kernel Module and driver Programming for x86
items.headline: Comprehensive Guide to System call and Linux internals on x86 platform
objectives_summary: Write modules to insert in kernel to alter the behavior and functionality of Linux kernel.
Student should be able to compile linux kernel from git source(kernel.org) or download the standalone kernel for compilation
The course introduces the concept of device driver and Major and minor number to effectively write a linux driver as a module or in kernel

items.title: Linux Performance Monitoring & Analysis - Hands On !!

visible_instructors.name: Shikhar
visible_instructors.title: Shikhar Verma • 40k+ Students Worldwide
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional system administrator and IT Trainer

items.headline: Start in-demand career as a Linux Server Admin and learn from real IT professionals with live Environment Sessions.
objectives_summary: Familiar with monitoring tools
Familiar with subsystems like CPU/Memory/IO/Network
Hands-On labs with examples.

items.title: Linux System Programming using C and C++(Practical Approach)
items.headline: Practical approach to Linux c-system programming for fork, thread, semaphore IPC, etc
objectives_summary: Students should be able to write their own system call and utilize existing system call on Linux/Unix to create system software.
Students should be able to understand Unix/Linux/Mac/Windows system in greater details
It would also help to brush up the C coding skills of students

items.title: Linux System Programming Techniques & Concepts
items.headline: For Developers - Build Linux Programmable Libraries, Makefiles, Memory Management, Compilation & Linking, C Programming
objectives_summary: Learn Advance Programming Concepts in C/C++
Develop and Integrate C/C++ Libraries
Automate Build Process using Makefile

items.title: Linux Command Line - From Zero to Expert

visible_instructors.name: Mohammad
visible_instructors.title: Mohammad Nauman
visible_instructors.job_title: Helping YOU learn software engineering, quickly and easily!

items.headline: Get in the rhythm of the command line as a first step towards Linux System Administration, VoIP and many more areas
objectives_summary: Understand the usage of Linux command line
Understand why experts prefer the command line instead over Graphical User Interfaces
Understand how simple commands can be chained together to solve real issues

items.title: Oracle Solaris 11 Administration and Sun Cluster Practical
items.headline: Learning Oracle Cloud Operating System Solaris 11.4 And Setup LAB for Oracle SUN CLUSTER 4.4 on Oracle Virtual Box
objectives_summary: After taking course students are able to do basic to advance administration like setup locally SUN CLUSTER environment and much more

Efficient in basic Linux command line
A very well understanding of how Linux works

items.headline: Learn to build your own cloud! Get familiar with Vmware ESXi, vSphere, vCenter, OpenFiler, vMotion and High Availability
objectives_summary: to download the free VMware vSphere ESXi, install VMware ESXi, work with the vSphere Client and manage a host using the vSphere Client
will learn about VMware Virtualization with VMware Player, vSphere ESXi, vSphere Client and VMware Converter
install and configure VMWare vCenter and OpenFiler

objectives_summary: Proactive Control 1: Verify Security
Proactive Control 2: Parameterize Queries
Proactive Control 3: Encode Data

items.title: Linux Command line Basics

objectives_summary: Demonstrate and operate Linux/Unix computer using command line and perform various day to day activities using command line and shell

items.title: Embedded Linux using Yocto
items.headline: Learn Yocto Project
objectives_summary: Yocto Project Terminology: poky, bitbake, oe-core, metadata, recipe, classes, configuration, layers, image and packages
Setting up build environment for Yocto development
Build an image and run it in QEMU for x86-64 and ARM architecture

objectives_summary: Control the Os X Command line, navigate your filesystem, manipulate and search files, and use keyboard shortcuts to do it more efficiently.
